section.title: Did you know...
section.para: Did you know hat today, 2006, more than 200,000,000 Christians are being disadvantaged, persecuted and even killed because of their faith? This map (German) shows the countries where people have to "pay" for their faith, and here is an English one that has some information about the main regions worldwide. These pages are from Open Doors, an independent organization trat tries to help persecuted Christians.
1Cor 12:26.27: "If one part of the body suffers, all the other parts share its suffering... You are Christ's body and each of you is an individual part of it."
